attributes.review:
i have awoken from my slumber, and decided to see what all of the fuss was about, referring to Trumpie, so i downloaded this app. instantly, as i downloaded this app, our bathtub fell onto my beloved, Trump supporting grandma. She had all of Trumps merch, and even had a picture of Trump under her pillow, what she does with that picture is unspeakable. Anyways, she died. in conclusion, there’s lots of room for improvement🧚‍♀️✨🌺🍃just not this one.🍃🌺✨🧚‍♀️

                                             Sincerely,
                                                         Grandma ❤️
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: I, for one, could not wait to get this app and see what was going on in the day to day life of our Great One🙏However, shortly after downloading it, it crashed and wiped my phone. When I went to the Apple store to get a new one, they did not let me in because I’m a freedom loving American who don’t need no mask. They then informed me that I was being arrested for multiple counts of homicide that was only discovered through the download of this app. I’m writing this from jail. Please do not download.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: I downloaded the Trump app a couple days ago and the first message I saw was “We will kill you and your Grandma”. I thought it was just a joke so I left the app alone. The next day an Oompa Loompa action figure appeared at the door with a note that said “Watch your granny on it” 😳😳 I was scared so I left the house, I came back to check on my granny to find her on the ground. She was drowned in cheese. The app also gave my phone a virus and it exploded so I had to buy another one 😡😡😡. DO NOT GET THIS APP!! YOUR GRANDMA WILL GET HURT 😌✨🧚🏽‍♀️
attributes.title: He KILLED my Grandma 🙄

attributes.review:
now I really REALLY wanted to keep up to date with Trump 2020. BUT THIS APP MAKES IT IMPOSSIBLE. As soon as I downloaded, the app took me into a seizure. WHY you might ask? THIS was because of the bright BLINDING colors that awake you as you open the app. They look very tacky and unprofessional. 

next. when I went to click on “enter mobile phone” it took me to a sketchy website on my safari. This website stole all my credit card info. NOW HOW AM I TO PAY FOR SALLY FOR CHRISTMAS.

all in all, I hate this app, do not recommend. NEVER VOTE FOR TRUMP. ❤️
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: Hilo, I downloaded this app to see what our wOnDeRfUl president had in mind for America. As soon as it finished downloading it asked me “are you sure you want this app with this big fat orange Oompa Loompa?” And of course I said yes it was our president of course so then when I got in the big fat orange Oompa Loompa looked me dead in the eyes and took my soul then after that I remembered a nightmare I had, I was at the playground and all of the sudden I see a BIG FAT ORANGE GOING DONE THE SLIDE! And I was scared for my dear life! So I soon as I remembered that nightmare I deleted the app.
attributes.title: BIG FAT ORANGE
